name: Baby Sneakers - Colorful Bright Pink and Green
description:
Baby Sneakers - Colorful World Collection - Colorful Bright Pink and Green - 100% Handmade by me

This beautiful Baby Sneakers are made of high quality 100% cotton fabric in bright candy colors with sew-on snap. The design is gender-neutral and may be worn by both girl and boy babies. Soft padded and very comfortable, have no exposed seams inside for baby footie comfort and easy to put, yet not so easy to kick off.

Materials:
Inside fabric 100% cotton
Outside fabric 100% cotton

Finished Sizes:
Size 1 (0-3 months) 4.0 inches
Size 2 (3-6 months) 4.25 inches
Size 3 (6-9 months) 4.5 inches
Size 4 (9-12 months) 4.75 inches (black or white Non-Slip gripping bottoms)
Size 5 (12-18 months) 5.0 inches (black or white Non-Slip gripping bottoms)


You can also choose custom order to pick the prefect color match for your little one.
https://www.etsy.com/listing/170284902/baby-sneakers-custom-order-colorful?

Need a different size? Just ask! I would love to make shoes exactly right for your little one.

Your ordered shoes will be ready to ship in 3-5 business days.
Products come from a smoke & pet free home.

These sizes are the average length of babies’ feet. Your baby’s feet may be longer or shorter than average. If you are able, be sure to measure your baby’s feet before you choose the size to make. Measure the foot from the tip of the big toe to the end of the heel. If your baby’s foot is in between two sizes, make the larger size.

Because these shoes will be sewn by me and not in a factory, the actual finished sized may be a slightly different.

If you are unsure of the size of the feet of the baby that you are ordering the shoes for (if they are a gift), you may want to order one size larger. This will ensure that the shoes will definitely fit the baby now... or for sure a little later.

These shoes are intended for indoor use or for keeping your baby a little warmer and fashionable when in their stroller. The shoes are not intended for outdoor use, as they would get worn out very quickly.

CONTINUE LOOKING AT MY SHOP:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/ricebabyshop

name: Baby Boots and Bib Combo - Black and Gray Dottie
description:
Baby Boots and Bib Combo - Black and Gray Dottie - 100% Handmade by me

ITEMS:
1 pair of handmade baby shoes
1 handmade bandanna baby bib

SHOES:
This beautiful Baby Shoes is made of high quality cotton fabric with elastic at the heel to keep baby from kicking them off. All my handmade shoes have an inner batting layer (to provide a little cushion and warmth). Soft padded and very comfortable and easy to put, yet not so easy to kick off.

Materials:
- Inside fabric 100% cotton
- Outside fabric 100% cotton

Finished Sizes:
- Size 1 (0-3 months) 4.0 inches
- Size 2 (3-6 months) 4.25 inches
- Size 3 (6-9 months) 4.5 inches
- Size 4 (9-12 months) 4.75 inches
- Size 5 (12-18 months) 5.0 inches

BIB:
A unique gift for your precious baby or stylish mama-to-be!

Materials:
- Front - soft cotton fabric
- Back - soft cotton fabric

Details:
- Handmade with high quality.
- Each will have a nickel-free snap closure, perfect to keep busy little hands from pulling off.
- Measures approximately 6.5 x 16 inches.
- Handmade from a smoke and pet free home.
- Top-stitched for durability, style & quality.
- Hand wash in cold water with like color. Warm iron if needed.

Need a different size? Just ask! I would love to make shoes exactly right for your little one.

Your ordered will be ready to ship in 3-5 business days.
Products come from a smoke & pet free home.

These sizes are the average length of babies’ feet. Your baby’s feet may be longer or shorter than average. If you are able, be sure to measure your baby’s feet before you choose the size to make. Measure the foot from the tip of the big toe to the end of the heel. If your baby’s foot is in between two sizes, make the larger size.

Because these shoes will be sewn by me and not in a factory, the actual finished sized may be a slightly different.

If you are unsure of the size of the feet of the baby that you are ordering the boots for (if they are a gift), you may want to order one size larger. This will ensure that the boots will definitely fit the baby now... or for sure a little later.

These boots are intended for indoor use or for keeping your baby a little warmer and fashionable when in their stroller. The shoes are not intended for outdoor use, as they would get worn out very quickly.
